thread.title: I Guess The Airport Situation In "Love Actually" Worked Out
thread.title_full: I Guess The Airport Situation In "Love Actually" Worked Out

author: Lauren Yapalater
title: I Guess The Airport Situation In "Love Actually" Worked Out
text:
View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 10545525 2. I assume if you’re reading this post you’re a fan or a curious hater. Either way you’re probably familiar with the storyline about the little boy and the little girl, Sam and Joanna. Ah, young love. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 10545563 3. At the end of the movie there’s a classic rom-com airport scene (but this time with a little kid that can run through security and it’s fine). View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 10545597 4. Either way, the airport scene ends with a kiss on the cheek! Even though we saw this in the movie, the girl still got on the plane. So the fate of our little lovebirds was still in question. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 10545491 5. Well, now that Love Actually is coming back for a 10-minute sequel , it looks like the airport situation turned out well. ID: 10545622 6. Some pics from the set show the girl, played by Olivia Olson, all grown up… View this image ›
Best Images / Best Images/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10545450 7. …and the boy all grown up… View this image ›
Best Images / Best Images/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES Yes, you also probably recognize him as Jojen Reed from Game Of Thrones.
ID: 10545679 8. …WITH A MUSTACHE! View this image ›
Best Images / Best Images/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10545688 9. But this isn’t about the mustache. It’s about how they are TOGETHER AGAIN. OR TOGETHER STILL???? View this image ›
Best Images / Best Images/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10545452 10. Because14 years later and here they are! View this image ›
Best Images / Best Images/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10545460 11. Just drinking coffee, reminiscing about their first kiss, and laughing about how they are the . 3% of the population that found their soulmate at 11-years-old. View this image ›
Best Images / Best Images/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10545697 12. Or maybe they just reconnected on Facebook. View this image ›
Best Images / Best Images/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10545459 13. Either way they are saying hey to Liam Neeson’s character who isn’t any more grown up than he was, but he’s older for sure. View this image ›
Best Images / Best Images/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10545457 14. Basically it seems like the airport situation really worked itself out! View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 10545455 15. In conclusion: always chase after the person you love in an airport, but only if you are living in a movie. ID: 10545767
